stories.name: Riya Sharma
stories.title: From Final Year Project to Funded Startup
stories.story: During her final year, Riya pitched an AI-based plant disease detection tool that is now used in 100+ farms across India. She raised seed funding within 6 months of graduation.
stories.lesson: Start small, test your ideas early, and don’t wait for perfect. Start now!

stories.name: Ankit Mehta
stories.title: Turning Coding into a Career at Google
stories.story: Ankit loved problem-solving during his classes. With consistent practice on LeetCode and mentorship from seniors, he cracked Google’s interview process in his final year.
stories.lesson: Consistency is underrated. Practice regularly and seek mentorship actively.
